title: [QUESTION] where can i purchase a life sized Willump plushy?

replies.body:
Are you looking for a friend for your life-sized Totoro plushy? :P

It doesn't look like we have one, but you can always find our official plushies [**here**](https://euw.merch.riotgames.com/en/collectibles/plush.html). If you have any other questions, feel free to hit me back. ^.^
